Verses: 1  andriyum, Sagodharare, Aavikkuriyavarangalaik Kuriththu Neengal Ariyaadhirukka Enakku Manadhillai.
2  neengal Agngnaanigalaayirundhapodhu Evappattapadiye, Oomaiyaana Vikkiragangalidaththil Manadhai Seluththineergalendru Ungalukkuth Theriyume.

3  aadhalaal, Dhevanudaiya Aaviyinaale Pesugira Evanum Yesuvai Sabikkappattavanendru Sollamaattaanendrum, Parisuththa Aaviyinaaleyandri Yesuvaik Karththarendru Oruvanum Sollakkoodaadhendrum, Ungalukkuth Therivikkiren.
4  varangalil Viththiyaasangal Undu Aaviyaanavar Oruvare.
5  oozhiyangalileyum Viththiyaasangal Undu, Karththar Oruvare.
6  kiriyaigalileyum Viththiyaasangalundu, Ellaarukkullum Ellaavatraiyum Nadappikkira Dhevan Oruvare.
7  aaviyinudaiya Anukkiragam Avanavanudaiya Pirayojanaththirkendru Alikkappattirukkiradhu.
8  eppadiyenil, Oruvanukku Aaviyinaale Gnaanaththaip Podhikkum Vasanamum, Veroruvanukku Andha Aaviyinaaleye Arivai Unarththum Vasanamum,
9  veroruvanukku Andha Aaviyinaaleye Visuvaasamum, Veroruvanukku Andha Aaviyinaaleye Kunamaakkum Varangalum,

10  veroruvanukku Arpudhangalaiseyyum Sakthiyum, Veroruvanukkuth Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththalum, Veroruvanukku Aavigalaip Paguththaridhalum, Veroruvanukkup Parpala Baashaigalaippesudhalum, Veroruvanukkup Baashaigalai Viyaakkiyaanampannudhalum Alikkappadugiradhu.
11  ivaigalaiyellaam Andha Ore Aaviyaanavar Nadappiththu, Thamadhu Siththaththinpadiye Avanavanukkup Pagirndhukodukkiraar.
12  eppadiyenil, Sareeram Ondru, Adharku Avayavangal Anegam; Ore Sareeraththin Avayavangalellaam Anegamaayirundhum, Sareeram Ondraagaveyirukkiradhu; Andhappiragaaramaagak Kiristhuvum Irukkiraar.

13  naam Yoodharaayinum, Kirekkaraayinum, Adimaigalaayinum, Suyaadheenaraayinum, Ellaarum Ore Aaviyinaale Ore Sareeraththirkullaaga Gnaanasnaanampannappattu, Ellaarum Ore Aavikkullaagave Thaagandheerkkappattom.
14  sareeramum Ore Avayavamaayiraamal Anega Avayavangalai Udaiyadhaayirukkiradhu.
15  kaalaanadhu Naan Kaiyaayiraadhapadiyinaale, Naan Sareeraththin Avayavamallavendraal, Adhinaale Adhu Sareeraththin Avayamaayiraadho?
16  kaadhaanadhu Naan Kannaayiraadhapadiyinaale, Naan Sareeraththin Avayavamallavendraal, Adhinaale Adhu Sareeraththin Avayavamaayiraadho?
17  sareeram Muzhuvadhum Kannaanaal, Sevi Enge? Adhu Muzhuvadhum Seviyaanaal, Moppam Enge?
18  dhevan Thamadhu Siththaththinpadi, Avayavangal Ovvondraiyum Sareeraththile Vaiththaar.
19  avaiyellaam Ore Avayavamaayirundhaal, Sareeram Enge?
20  avayavangal Anegamaayirundhum Sareeram Ondre.
21  kannaanadhu Kaiyaippaarththu: Nee Enakku Venduvadhillaiyendrum; Thalaiyaanadhu Kaalgalai Nokki: Neengal Enakku Venduvadhillaiyendrum Sollakkoodaadhu.
22  sareera Avayavangalil Balaveenamullavaigalaaik Kaanappadugiravaigale Migavum Vendiyavaigalaayirukkiradhu.
23  melum, Sareera Avayavangalil Ganaveenamaaik Kaanappadugiravaigalukke Adhiga Ganaththaik Kodukkirom; Nammil Latchanamillaadhavaigale Adhiga Alangaaram Perum;
24  nammil Ilatchanamullavaigalukku Alangarippu Vendiyadhillai.

25  sareeraththile Pirivinaiyundaayiraamal, Avayavangal Ondraikkuriththu Ondru Kavalaiyaayirukkumpadikku, Dhevan Ganaththil Kuraivulladharku Adhiga Ganaththaik Koduththu, Ippadi Sareeraththai Amaiththirukkiraar.
26  aadhalaal Oru Avayavam Paadupattaal Ellaa Avayavangalum Koodap Paadupadum; Oru Avayavam Magimaippattaal Ellaa Avayavangalum Kooda Santhoshappadum.
27  neengale Kiristhuvin Sareeramaayum, Thaniththaniye Avayavangalaayumirukkireergal.

28  dhevanaanavar Sabaiyile Mudhalaavadhu Apposthalaraiyum, Irandaavadhu Theerkkadharisigalaiyum, Moondraavadhu Podhakargalaiyum, Pinbu Arpudhangalaiyum, Pinbu Kunamaakkum Varangalaiyum, Oozhiyangalaiyum, Aalugaigalaiyum, Palavidha Baashaigalaiyum Erpaduththinaar
29  ellaarum Apposthalargalaa? Ellaarum Theerkkadharisigalaa? Ellaarum Podhakargalaa? Ellaarum Arpudhangalai Seygiravargalaa?
30  ellaarum Gunamaakkum Varangaludaiyavargalaa? Ellaarum Anniyabaashaigalaip Pesugiraargalaa? Ellaarum Viyaakkiyaanam Pannugiraargalaa?
31  ippadiyirukka, Mukkiyamaana Varangalai Naadungal; Innum Adhiga Menmaiyaana Vazhiyaiyum Ungalukkuk Kaanbikkiren.
